description: An adversary may compress data (e.g., sensitive documents) that is collected prior to exfiltration in order to make it portable and minimize the amount of data sent over the network. Author: Timur Zinniatullin, E.M. Anhaus, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Highly likely if rar is a default archiver in the monitored environment.
name: Data Compressed - rar.exe
